dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Nyxara, shadow-weaver of the Umbral Caverns, your dark arts end here. Turn back, or face the wrath of the Guardians of Light.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You underestimate my power, Seraphel. My shadows will consume your light!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your arrogance blinds you. Light prevails even in the darkest of times. Prepare to be dismantled.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let's see if your light can withstand the chill of my Soulflame!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your Soulflame is but a flicker in the presence of celestial radiance. This fight was inevitable.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I thrive in inevitable battles. Let your end be a lesson to others.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then welcome the embrace of destiny. We clash now!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'll turn your celestial radiance into everlasting night!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Feel the true power of light as it obliterates your darkness. This ends now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will unleash the horrors you cannot fathom!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Summon them all, Nyxara. The more you send, the brighter my light shall shine.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then let my shadows dance with your light until one consumes the other!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your dance will end in defeat. Come, meet your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Step aside, or face oblivion with your pride!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pride and justice go hand in hand. I step aside for no evil!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You cannot fathom the depths of darkness I command.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Darkness, even at its depths, is no match for the purity of light!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'll revel in destroying your so-called purity!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Purity will prevail over malevolence. Stand ready to be vanquished.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My command over shadows will shatter your purity!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your shadows are weak against divine light. Prepare to be erased.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: What makes you so righteous, Seraphel? Have you never strayed from your path of light?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: My path is guided by principles of justice and purity. Straying is the way of the weak.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Principles are chains that prevent you from seeing true power!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: True power lies in righteousness and discipline, not in chaos and malevolence. You will be stopped.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'll show you the strength of chaos!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your chaotic strength is hollow. I will put an end to your delusions.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Discipline? How boring. How mundane. How...weak.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Weakness lies in a lack of purpose and conviction. Your jesting ends here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your principles will be your undoing. Darkness has no chains.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Darkness may not have chains, but it lacks true direction. Your downfall is certain.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Direction? My only direction is absolute dominion!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Dominion sought through shadows ends in failure. And now, we clash!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Principles are the arrogances of the blind.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Blind are those who think darkness can bring clarity. Your end is nigh.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Straying is the way of progress. Stagnation is the fallacy of the self-righteous.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Progress through corruption breeds catastrophe. As an avatar of light, I shall stop you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then try, and fail!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Failure isn't an option for me. Prepare yourself, darkness!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'll bring the catastrophe, and you shall witness it!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Witness your own defeat instead. Let the battle begin.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Step aside, dragon. The Shattered Realms of Dusk are mine to command now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Command this realm? You? Such delusions. I cannot allow this heresy to continue.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Heresy? Nay, destiny! And it shall be mine!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Destiny forged in darkness is destined to crumble. You will not succeed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You shall witness the birth of my new world!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: And I shall be the one to stop it before it begins. Here and now, we fight!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Nothing will stand in my way, not even you!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I stand against you, unwavering and unyielding. Prepare for battle!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The Guardians of Light shall fall, starting with you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The Guardians of Light are stronger than you believe. I will show you our true power.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Show me then, and I'll shatter it!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Prepare to be overwhelmed by the light's might. This ends now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You are but the first to fall in my conquest.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I am the first and last barrier you will face. Ready yourself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your light will be snuffed out by my shadows.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your shadows lack the strength to challenge the divine. Face the power of light!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Divinity is an illusion. True power is in the darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Such illusions blind you to reality. This is where your journey ends.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My shadows are more potent than any light.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: They are but fleeting shadows. Face the eternal light!
